attributes.mlflow.spanInputs:
{"history": "I want to fly from SFO to LAX during the week of July 4th. I use a wheelchair and need accessible flights. Please show me the weather at both locations and the best flight options.
### Weather Information
#### San Francisco (SFO)
* Current Weather: Partly Cloudy
* Temperature: 67°F (19°C)
* Humidity: 64%
#### Los Angeles (LAX)
* Current Weather: Sunny
* Temperature: 84°F (29°C)
* Humidity: 54%

### Flight Options
To find the best accessible flights from SFO to LAX during the week of July 4th, I'll need to know your specific travel dates and any other accessibility requirements you may have. However, I can provide you with some general information about accessible flights.

Here are a few options:
| Airline | Flight Price | Travel Dates | Direct Booking Link | Accessibility Features | Special Assistance Services | Baggage Allowance | Cancellation Policy |
| --- | --- | --- | --- | --- | --- | --- | --- |
| American Airlines | $200 | July 3 - July 10 | [Book Now](https://www.aa.com/) | ✅ Wheelchair accessibility, ✅ Accessible lavatories | ✅ Special assistance services, ✅ Wheelchair assistance | 1 bag free | 24-hour cancellation policy |
| Delta Air Lines | $250 | July 3 - July 10 | [Book Now](https://www.delta.com/) | ✅ Wheelchair accessibility, ✅ Accessible lavatories | ✅ Special assistance services, ✅ Wheelchair assistance | 1 bag free | 24-hour cancellation policy |
| United Airlines | $220 | July 3 - July 10 | [Book Now](https://www.united.com/) | ✅ Wheelchair accessibility, ✅ Accessible lavatories | ✅ Special assistance services, ✅ Wheelchair assistance | 1 bag free | 24-hour cancellation policy |

Please note that these options are subject to change and may not be available on all days during the week of July 4th. I recommend checking with the airlines for the most up-to-date information and to book your flight in advance to ensure availability.

Could you please provide your specific travel dates and any other accessibility requirements you may have? I'll be happy to assist you further."}
attributes.mlflow.spanOutputs:
{"text": {"markdown": "# Travel Summary
## Weather
* San Francisco (SFO): Partly Cloudy, 67°F (19°C), 64% humidity
* Los Angeles (LAX): Sunny, 84°F (29°C), 54% humidity
## Flights
| Airline | Flight Price | Travel Dates | Accessibility Features | Special Assistance Services | Baggage Allowance | Cancellation Policy |
| --- | --- | --- | --- | --- | --- | --- |
| American Airlines | $200 | July 3 - July 10 | Wheelchair accessibility, Accessible lavatories | Special assistance services, Wheelchair assistance | 1 bag free | 24-hour cancellation policy |
| Delta Air Lines | $250 | July 3 - July 10 | Wheelchair accessibility, Accessible lavatories | Special assistance services, Wheelchair assistance | 1 bag free | 24-hour cancellation policy |
| United Airlines | $220 | July 3 - July 10 | Wheelchair accessibility, Accessible lavatories | Special assistance services, Wheelchair assistance | 1 bag free | 24-hour cancellation policy |
## Next Steps
To confirm your flight, please provide your specific travel dates and any additional accessibility requirements. This will help us find the best options for your needs."}}

attributes.text:
Prompt after formatting:
[32;1m[1;3mYou are a travel assistant. Given the following conversation history, generate a single, user-friendly markdown summary for a travel UI. Include weather, a markdown table of flight options, accessibility features, and any follow-up questions. Do not include the user's original question or any code blocks or JSON in the markdown.

Return your answer as a JSON object with a single field 'markdown' whose value is the markdown string.
Example:
{"markdown": "# Weather\n* San Francisco: ...\n* Los Angeles: ...\n## Flights\n| Airline | ... |"}

Conversation history:
I want to fly from SFO to LAX during the week of July 4th. I use a wheelchair and need accessible flights. Please show me the weather at both locations and the best flight options.
### Weather Information
#### San Francisco (SFO)
* Current Weather: Partly Cloudy
* Temperature: 67°F (19°C)
* Humidity: 64%
#### Los Angeles (LAX)
* Current Weather: Sunny
* Temperature: 84°F (29°C)
* Humidity: 54%

### Flight Options
To find the best accessible flights from SFO to LAX during the week of July 4th, I'll need to know your specific travel dates and any other accessibility requirements you may have. However, I can provide you with some general information about accessible flights.

Here are a few options:
| Airline | Flight Price | Travel Dates | Direct Booking Link | Accessibility Features | Special Assistance Services | Baggage Allowance | Cancellation Policy |
| --- | --- | --- | --- | --- | --- | --- | --- |
| American Airlines | $200 | July 3 - July 10 | [Book Now](https://www.aa.com/) | ✅ Wheelchair accessibility, ✅ Accessible lavatories | ✅ Special assistance services, ✅ Wheelchair assistance | 1 bag free | 24-hour cancellation policy |
| Delta Air Lines | $250 | July 3 - July 10 | [Book Now](https://www.delta.com/) | ✅ Wheelchair accessibility, ✅ Accessible lavatories | ✅ Special assistance services, ✅ Wheelchair assistance | 1 bag free | 24-hour cancellation policy |
| United Airlines | $220 | July 3 - July 10 | [Book Now](https://www.united.com/) | ✅ Wheelchair accessibility, ✅ Accessible lavatories | ✅ Special assistance services, ✅ Wheelchair assistance | 1 bag free | 24-hour cancellation policy |

Please note that these options are subject to change and may not be available on all days during the week of July 4th. I recommend checking with the airlines for the most up-to-date information and to book your flight in advance to ensure availability.

Could you please provide your specific travel dates and any other accessibility requirements you may have? I'll be happy to assist you further.[0m

{"history": "I want to fly from SFO to LAX during the week of July 4th. I use a wheelchair and need accessible flights. Please show me the weather at both locations and the best flight options.
### Weather Information
#### San Francisco (SFO)
* Current Weather: Partly Cloudy
* Temperature: 67°F (19°C)
* Humidity: 64%
#### Los Angeles (LAX)
* Current Weather: Sunny
* Temperature: 84°F (29°C)
* Humidity: 54%

### Flight Options
To find the best accessible flights from SFO to LAX during the week of July 4th, I'll need to know your specific travel dates and any other accessibility requirements you may have. However, I can provide you with some general information about accessible flights.

Here are a few options:
| Airline | Flight Price | Travel Dates | Direct Booking Link | Accessibility Features | Special Assistance Services | Baggage Allowance | Cancellation Policy |
| --- | --- | --- | --- | --- | --- | --- | --- |
| American Airlines | $200 | July 3 - July 10 | [Book Now](https://www.aa.com/) | ✅ Wheelchair accessibility, ✅ Accessible lavatories | ✅ Special assistance services, ✅ Wheelchair assistance | 1 bag free | 24-hour cancellation policy |
| Delta Air Lines | $250 | July 3 - July 10 | [Book Now](https://www.delta.com/) | ✅ Wheelchair accessibility, ✅ Accessible lavatories | ✅ Special assistance services, ✅ Wheelchair assistance | 1 bag free | 24-hour cancellation policy |
| United Airlines | $220 | July 3 - July 10 | [Book Now](https://www.united.com/) | ✅ Wheelchair accessibility, ✅ Accessible lavatories | ✅ Special assistance services, ✅ Wheelchair assistance | 1 bag free | 24-hour cancellation policy |

Please note that these options are subject to change and may not be available on all days during the week of July 4th. I recommend checking with the airlines for the most up-to-date information and to book your flight in advance to ensure availability.

Could you please provide your specific travel dates and any other accessibility requirements you may have? I'll be happy to assist you further."}
